CustomField.formula: IF( AND( NOT(ISBLANK(Last_Activity_Date__c )), NOT(ISBLANK( Ideal_Call_Frequency_Days__c)), IsPersonAccount ) , IF( (TODAY() - Last_Activity_Date__c)/Ideal_Call_Frequency_Days__c < 0.75, IMAGE('/resource/1319081298000/greenIcon', 'green icon' , 25,25), IF( (TODAY() - Last_Activity_Date__c)/Ideal_Call_Frequency_Days__c < 1, IMAGE('/resource/1319081274000/yellowIcon', 'yellow icon' , 25,25), IMAGE('/resource/1319081248000/redIcon', 'red icon' , 25,25) ) ),'' )
CustomField.label: Contact Status
